attributes.action: change the law to ensure that the extended family of any taxpayer who is murdered should be exempt from paying any more income tax for the duration that the murderer of their relative is allowed to live in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is an immorality that the relatives of victims of murder should be made to contribute, through paying income tax, to the well being and luxury in which convicted murderers are maintained whilst incarcerated in prisons in this country.  As the numbers of murders increase in this country the focus of the government will be maintained because, under this scheme, the number of people not paying income tax would increase in proportion, thereby reducing the amount of money available to be spent keeping convicted murderers in their luxurious environs.
